name: Keep Connection
description:
Keep Connection is a co-op game for 2 people. 

Each person controlls one robot (WASD and arrows)  and the goal is to get to correct button. Beware of traps, remember keep connection.

music - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

For sound effects - sfxr
